entry.sentence: They had gotten as far as the exit during this conversation and had to break off .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP They)) (VP (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN gotten) (ADVP (RB as) (RB far)) (PP (IN as) (NP (DT the) (NN exit))) (PP (IN during) (NP (DT this) (NN conversation))))) (CC and) (VP (VBD had) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB break) (PRT (RP off))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(gotten-3, They-1) nsubj(had-13, They-1) xsubj(break-15, They-1) aux(gotten-3, had-2) root(ROOT-0, gotten-3) advmod(far-5, as-4) advmod(gotten-3, far-5) det(exit-8, the-7) prep_as(gotten-3, exit-8) det(conversation-11, this-10) prep_during(gotten-3, conversation-11) conj_and(gotten-3, had-13) aux(break-15, to-14) xcomp(had-13, break-15) prt(break-15, off-16)

entry.sentence: In front of them was an elegant car .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN In) (NP (NP (NN front)) (PP (IN of)))) (NP (PRP them)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (DT an) (JJ elegant) (NN car))) (. .)))
entry.deps: prep_in(car-8, front-2) prep(front-2, of-3) nsubj(car-8, them-4) cop(car-8, was-5) det(car-8, an-6) amod(car-8, elegant-7) root(ROOT-0, car-8)

entry.sentence: Fred just lifted his wife into it and then looked around for his brother and his companion .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Fred)) (ADVP (RB just)) (VP (VP (VBD lifted) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife)) (PP (IN into) (NP (PRP it)))) (CC and) (VP (ADVP (RB then)) (VBD looked) (PRT (RP around)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (PRP$ his) (NN brother)) (CC and) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN companion)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(lifted-3, Fred-1) nsubj(looked-10, Fred-1) advmod(lifted-3, just-2) root(ROOT-0, lifted-3) poss(wife-5, his-4) dobj(lifted-3, wife-5) prep_into(lifted-3, it-7) advmod(looked-10, then-9) conj_and(lifted-3, looked-10) prt(looked-10, around-11) poss(brother-14, his-13) prep_for(looked-10, brother-14) poss(companion-17, his-16) prep_for(looked-10, companion-17) conj_and(brother-14, companion-17)

entry.sentence: Magnus hurried to help Rosemarie get in .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Magnus)) (VP (VBN hurried) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB help) (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VB get) (PRT (RP in)))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Then the gentlemen also took their seats .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (RB Then) (NP (DT the) (NNS gentlemen)) (VP (ADVP (RB also)) (VBD took) (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS seats))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: The valet and the chambermaid followed with the luggage in another carriage .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN valet)) (CC and) (NP (DT the) (NN chambermaid))) (VP (VBD followed) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT the) (NN luggage))) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT another) (NN carriage)))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: During the ride , Frau Ellen chatted harmlessly and cheerfully , and the gentlemen took pains to answer her in the same tone .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN During) (NP (DT the) (NN ride))) (, ,) (S (NP (NNP Frau) (NNP Ellen)) (VP (VBD chatted) (ADVP (RB harmlessly)))) (CC and) (ADVP (RB cheerfully)) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (DT the) (NNS gentlemen)) (VP (VBD took) (NP (NNS pains)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB answer) (NP (PRP her)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN tone)))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: The fact that Rosemarie was rather quiet was not noticed - at least not by Frau Ellen .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN fact)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB rather) (JJ quiet)))))) (VP (VBD was) (RB not) (VP (VBN noticed) (: -) (ADVP (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least) (RB not)) (PP (IN by) (NP (NNP Frau) (NNP Ellen)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(fact-2, The-1) nsubjpass(noticed-10, fact-2) mark(quiet-7, that-3) nsubj(quiet-7, Rosemarie-4) cop(quiet-7, was-5) advmod(quiet-7, rather-6) dep(fact-2, quiet-7) auxpass(noticed-10, was-8) neg(noticed-10, not-9) root(ROOT-0, noticed-10) advmod(noticed-10, at-12) pobj(at-12, least-13) dep(at-12, not-14) nn(Ellen-17, Frau-16) prep_by(at-12, Ellen-17)
